snippet: The Baltimore police were investigating a sign inside a police van telling passengers, “Enjoy your ride, cuz we sure will!” the authorities said.
abstract: Baltimore police are investigating facetious sign inside transport van after six police officers are charged in death of Freddie Gray, who died from spinal injuries after being transported in police wagon.
lead_paragraph: The Baltimore police were investigating a sign inside a police van telling passengers, “Enjoy your ride, cuz we sure will!” the authorities said.

headline.main: Maryland: Sign in Police Van Investigated
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Sign In Police Van Investigated
